summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of SmartStore Seller-side UI-only application. All core functionality working correctly including authentication flows, dashboard, navigation, and responsive behavior.

design_issues.issue: Sidebar doesn't collapse properly on mobile viewport (390px) - shows 256px width instead of expected 64px collapsed width

passed_tests: Root path redirect to /login
Login page loads with title 'Welcome back' and all required fields
Login form submission navigates to /dashboard
Signup page loads with split layout and trust indicators (Amazon, Flipkart, Shopify, eBay, Etsy)
Signup form submission navigates to /dashboard
Forgot password page with success state and navigation
Dashboard loads with app shell (header with logo, store selector, notifications, help, user avatar)
All 4 metric cards show correct values (Total Products: 1,248, Active Listings: 983, Orders Today: 47, Inventory Alerts: 5)
Recent Activity section with 5 items
Quick Actions section with 4 action buttons
Sidebar with 8 navigation items (Dashboard, Products, Inventory, Orders, Pricing, Marketplaces, Reports, Settings)
Sidebar collapse toggle functionality
Store selector dropdown with 3 stores
User menu dropdown with Profile, Settings, Logout options
Notifications dropdown with 3 notifications
Navigation links work for all placeholder pages
All cross-page navigation links (loginâ†”signup, forgot password flows)
Logout functionality returns to login page
Responsive behavior - sidebar collapses on tablet screens
All interactive elements properly clickable with data-testid attributes
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor responsive issue: Fix sidebar collapse on mobile viewport (390px) to ensure it shows 64px collapsed width instead of 256px. Overall application is working excellently.
